alert.note: Alert for Pipestone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:53PM CDT until July 13 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Pipestone County in southwestern Minnesota... Moody County in east central South Dakota... Northeastern Lake County in east central South Dakota... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nunda, or 13 miles southwest of Brookings, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. At 535 pm, the public reported golf ball size hail 2 miles south of Sinai, South Dakota! IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Colman around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Egan, Flandreau and Trent. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
